statements: UPDATE player_engagement_metrics SET total_playtime = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_engagement_metrics SET last_login = '2022-01-10 15:30:00' , average_session_duration = 45 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_engagement_metrics SET average_session_duration = 45, total_playtime = 500 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_engagement_metrics SET total_sessions = 10, last_login = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE player_engagement_metrics SET total_sessions = 10, total_playtime = 50.25 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE game_design SET total_revenue = 50000.75, active_players = 1000 WHERE game_id = 456
UPDATE player_engagement_metrics SET total_sessions = total_sessions + 1, total_playtime = total_playtime + 2.5 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE game_design SET active_players = 500, total_revenue = total_revenue - 1000.00 WHERE game_id = 201;
UPDATE player_metrics SET total_playtime = 500, logins = 25 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE game_levels SET difficulty = 3, campaign_id = 5 WHERE level_id = 10;
UPDATE player_metrics SET total_playtime = 150, logins = logins + 1 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE game_levels SET difficulty = 3, level_name = 'Advanced Level' WHERE level_id = 5;
UPDATE player_info SET age = 25 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_info SET registration_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_info SET player_name='John Doe', age=25 WHERE player_id=101;
UPDATE player_activity SET activity_type='Online', game_id=201 WHERE player_id=103;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_events SET event_type = 'win' WHERE player_id = 2;
